alert.note: Alert for Southern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 6:03PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Rosebud County through 645 PM MDT... At 559 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Birney, or 15 miles southwest of Ashland, moving slowly to the northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail and very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Small hail may accumulate in spots. Watch for ponding water in low lying areas due to heavy rainfall. Locations impacted include... Ashland, Birney Village and Northern Cheyenne Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
